snippet.title: For the King - Official Console Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW on PlayStation 4:
https://store.playstation.com/#!/cid=EP4395-CUSA12941_00-FORTHEKING000001
OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/For-The-King-1549771.html
OUT NOW on Xbox One:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/for-the-king/bp2bw45wz45z?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Subscribe now for more news and updates: https://bit.ly/2AMyqSx

---

Curve Digital and IronOak Games are proud to announce that the critically acclaimed rogue-like RPG For The King is now available on Playstation 4, and will be available on  Nintendo Switch (9th) and Xbox One (10th) this week for £19.99/€24.99/$24.99. All platforms will receive a 20% launch discount (lasting two weeks - grab it while it’s hot!) and preorders are already available for Nintendo Switch and Xbox One!

For The King is a strategic RPG that blends tabletop and roguelike elements in a challenging adventure that spans the realms. Incredibly replayable, venture forth into the lands of Fahrul and discover that every playthrough is unique with procedural maps, quests, and events. Just remember adventurer, you do this not for riches or fame but for your village, for your realm, For The King!

---
